sourceRecordOrder.description: Order of a record in imported file

sourceRecordActionStatus.description: Status of action performed above a record

sourceRecordTenantId.description: Id of tenant in which action was performed over record

relatedInstanceInfo.description: Information about instance associated with source record

relatedHoldingsInfo.description: Information about holdings associated with source record

relatedItemInfo.description: Information about item associated with source record

relatedAuthorityInfo.description: Information about authority associated with source record

relatedPoLineInfo.description: Information about poLine associated with source record

actionStatus.description: Status of action performed above folio entity, value MULTIPLE if multiple entities of the same type were affected

idList.description: Id of entities which were affected during data import process

hridList.description: Human readable id of entities which were affected during data import process

relatedInvoiceInfo.description: Information about invoice associated with source record

relatedInvoiceLineInfo.description: Information about invoice line associated with source record

actionStatus.description: Status of action performed with invoice line

fullInvoiceLineNumber.description: Consists of vendor invoice number and invoice line sequence number

invoiceLineJournalRecordId.description: UUID of journalRecord which keeps data of particular invoice line processing
